snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s plan would create more than one million square feet of event space and New York City’s largest ballroom at the convention center.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo unveils $1 billion plan to expand Jacob K Javits Convention Center; plan is latest project announced in lead up to Cuomo's State of the State speech.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s plan would create more than one million square feet of event space and New York City’s largest ballroom at the convention center.

headline.main: Cuomo Announces $1 Billion Expansion for Javits Center
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Announces $1 Billion Expansion for Javits Convention Center

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Javits, Jacob K, Convention Center (Manhattan, NY)
